channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Verily AI (Google Life Sciences) on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Looks Too Good To Be True: An Information-Theoretic Analysis of Hallucinations in Generative Restoration Models
item.description: Generative image restoration models face a critical trade-off: higher perceptual quality often leads to increased hallucinations (unreliable predictions).
